verses.text: TAUTAPA mu‘a: ko hai ‘e tali koe? ‘Io, ko hai ‘i he ha‘a Tapu te ke hanga ki ai?
Sa‘a! ko e vale ‘oku ‘itangofua te ne ‘auha, Pea ko e lēlea lau ‘oku māfana vave, ko hono mate‘anga ia.
Ne u mamata ‘e au ki he vale kuo fu‘u ma‘uma‘uluta; Kae fokifā pē na‘a ku talakaa‘i hono nofo‘anga.
Ko ‘ene fānau ē na‘e masiva ha ni‘ihi ke tokoni, Pea ‘oku laiki kinautolu ‘i he fai‘anga fono, ‘o ‘ikai ha ‘aofi.
‘Io, ‘oku kai hono ta‘u ‘e he fiekaia, ‘O ne to‘o mei he loto ‘ā talatala, Pea ‘oku fanga ‘a e hele ki he‘enau koloa.
He ‘oku ‘ikai ke fisi ‘a e kovi mei he efu, Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ke tupu mei he kelekele ‘a e mamahi;
He na‘e fā‘ele‘i ‘a e tangata ki he mamahi, Hangē ‘oku puna hake ‘a e ngaahi kalofiama.
Ka ‘oka ne ko au, te u ha‘ao kia ‘Ela, ‘Io, te u ‘ave ki he ‘Otua ‘eku me‘a:
‘A ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘oku ne fai me‘a lalahi mo ta‘emahakulea; ‘Ani me‘a fakaofo mo ta‘efa‘alaua.
‘Oku ne tuku ‘uha ki he funga fonua, ‘O fekau atu ha vai ki he mata ‘o e ngoue‘anga:
Ko ‘ene fakamā‘olunga ‘a si‘i mā‘ulalo; Pea nofo ‘a kau tangi ki he malu ‘a mo‘unga.
‘Oku ne motuhi ‘a e fakakaukau ‘a e kau olo, Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke lava ‘e honau nima ‘a e me‘a ‘oku nau fai ki ai.
‘Oku ne pō ‘a e kau poto ‘i he fai olopoto ‘anautolu; Kae tū‘ulu ‘a e fale‘i ‘oku fai ‘e he kau mamio.
Kei ‘aho ‘oku nau hū ki he po‘uli, ‘Io, ‘oku nau taupō ho‘atā ‘o hangē ko e pō ia.
Pea ‘oku ne fakahaofi si‘i masiva mei he heletā ‘a honau ngutu, Pea mei he nima ‘o e kau fakamālohi.
Ko ia ‘oku tupu ha ‘amanaki ki he vaivai, Pea ‘oku kū ngutu ‘a e kovi.
Tala atu, ‘oku monū‘ia ‘a e tangata ‘oku tautea ‘e ‘Elohā: Ko ia, ‘oua te ke va‘inga‘aki ‘a e ako ‘oku fai ‘e Sātai.
He ko e taha ia ‘oku mulu‘i, ‘o toe ha‘iha‘i; ‘Oku ne ‘ai ke kafo, pea ko hono nima ai pē ‘oku faito‘o,
Te ne fakahaofi koe ‘i he faingata‘a ‘e ono; Pea ‘i hono fitu ‘e ‘ikai lave ha kovi kiate koe.
Ka honge, te ne fakahaofi koe mei he mate; Pea mei he ivi ‘o e heletā ‘oka ko e tau.
‘I he tā ‘a e uipi ko e ‘elelo, te ke nofo fufū; ‘E ‘ikai te ke manavahē ki he faka‘auha ‘oka ‘unu‘unu mai.
Ko e faka‘auha mo e hālofia te ke kata ki ai; Pea ‘e ‘ikai te ke manavahē ki he manu fekai ‘o e fonua.
Kaekehe, ‘e ai ha‘o talite mo e ngaahi maka ‘o e vao; Pea ‘e melino ho vā mo e manu kaivao.
Pea te ke ‘ilo ‘oku tu‘umālie ho tēniti; Pea ‘i ho‘o lau ho‘o monumanu, ‘oku ‘ikai hē ha taha.
Pea te ke ‘ilo ‘e lahi ho hako, Pea hangē ko e mohuku ‘o e fonua ho pikilau.
Te ke hoko ki ho tanu‘anga kuo ke fu‘u a‘u, Pea hangē ha ‘ū koane ‘oku utu ‘i Faka‘afumate.
Tala atu, ko eni pē: Kuo mau hakule ki ai, pea ko ia pē; Fanongo ki ai, pea ‘ilo ‘e koe ma‘au.
